residency_requirements: applicant was physically present for 621 days out of 1095 required
absences may be counted if they are temporary and ties to Canada are maintained
decision_outcome: case remanded with instructions to reassess residency based on proper criteria
procedural_fairness: appeal heard by Federal Court - Trial Division under new rules treating appeals as applications rather than trials de novo
legal_basis: applicants must accumulate at least three years of residence in Canada within four years before applying
